title: Changes in the nominal interest rate

content.prompt: Which of the following changes will necessarily occur as a result of an increase in the nominal interest rate?

choices.label: The money demand curve will shift to the left.
The money demand curve will shift to the right.
The money supply curve will shift to the left.
The quantity of money supplied will decrease.
The quantity of money demanded will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
